dmca.title: DMCA Complaint - Beijingtrip.com
dmca.body:
ATTN: Google, Inc. 
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA, 94043, USA
Fax: (650) 963-3255

FROM: Catherine He  
Beijingtrip.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. 
Suite 513Yu Yuan Mansion,
No.65 Nan Er Huan Xi Duan,
Xi'an, Shaanxi, 710068, P.R.C.
Tel: (86-29) 8523 6688 Ext. 207
Fax: (86-29) 8539 7349 
E-mail: edit@beijingtrip.com

SUBJ: Copyright Infringement 
PAGE: 3
DATE: March 15, 2007

Sent via fax&email

Dear Google, Inc. 
1. I, the webmaster of www.beijingtrip.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. I am looking forward for your concerns about the websites copied the below pages from our website. 

The offender is www.ebeijing.gov.cn. They copied 4 pages of contents from our website. So we are here to ask for your investigation and removal of the infringing pages. 

One more thing I would like to mention here is that our website www.travelchinaguide.com regularly updates our content to ensure the accuracy of the info. Thus we found that some of the contents they copied are now our old versions. Therefore we've provided the records on www.archive.org as proof. 

2. Hereunder is the detailed information on the pages they have copied from our website: 

(1)Search Query "Hutong Culture"
our Copyrighted page: 
http://web.archive.org/web/20010409215822/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/culture.htm   (our April 2001 version) 
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.ebeijing.gov.cn/HomeBj/Hutong/AHutong/t156929.htm  (They copied our old version)
(2)Search Query "Hutong History"
our Copyrighted page: 
http://web.archive.org/web/20010119141400/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/history.htm    (October 2001 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.ebeijing.gov.cn/HomeBj/Hutong/AHutong/t156930.htm  (They copied our content from the very beginning to "more and more Hutong appeared" in the fifth parapraph.)

(3)Search Query "what is Hutong"
our Copyrighted page: 
http://web.archive.org/web/20010119144300/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/hutong.htm  (January 2001 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.ebeijing.gov.cn/HomeBj/Hutong/AHutong/t156931.htm    

(4)Search Query "www.ebeijing.gov.cn/Tour/Cuisine/LoCuisine/t156805.htm"
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20020210195655/http://www.beijingtrip.com/dining/bestfood/duck.htm (July 2005 version)
Infringing Web Page: 
http://www.ebeijing.gov.cn/Tour/Cuisine/LoCuisine/t156805.htm  

3. My contact information:
Catherine He 
edit@beijingtrip.com
www.beijingtrip.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
Suite 513, Yu Yuan Mansion,
No.65 Nan Er Huan Xi Duan,
Xi'an, Shaanxi, 710068, P.R.C.

4. The contact info of the copyright offender www.ebeijing.gov.cn is:
Email: english@beijing.gov.cn
Fax: 86 10 6837 3088

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thank you very much!

Yours sincerely,

Catherine He
